LanguageData.GR_Failures_Shameful.stages.0.label: genetic failures
LanguageData.GR_Failures_Shameful.stages.0.descriptio: One of our genetics experiments failed, and a misshapen monstrosity is running around uncheked. We should get rid of it as soon as possible, for this shames us.
LanguageData.GR_Failures_Disliked.stages.0.label: genetic failures
LanguageData.GR_Failures_Disliked.stages.0.descriptio: One of our genetics experiments failed. We should get rid of it as soon as possible.
